error.title: Failed to load booking data
error.description: The booking data could not be loaded. Please refresh the page or try again.

success.title: Interview Booked!
success.message: You have successfully booked your interview slot. An email with the details has been sent to you.

confirmDialog.message: Are you sure you want to book this interview slot?

bookingSuccess.detail: An email with the details has been sent to you.

slotAlreadyBooked.detail: This slot was booked by another applicant. Please select a different slot.

bookingError.detail: An error occurred while booking the slot. Please try again.
